page.title: 16Spare Time:Hadleigh
page.content: In my Mum and Dad's spare time they either watch television or do some gardening. * * * * * * * * * * My Daddy does gardening every weekend, my Mummy sits and has a cup of coffee and reads a book. * * * * * * * * * * In his spare time my Dad plays golf.My Mum paints garden gnomes and knits. * * * * * * * * * * In his spare time my Dad watches T.V. or has a cup of tea and reads the news- paper.My Mum goes to sleep or watches T.V. * * * * * * * * * * My Mum's hobby is painting,she is very good.My Dad likes to watch cricket on T.V. My sister goes to play with her friends.My brother is a pest in his spare time.
